data.desc: Engineering invites renowned experts all over the world to be its editorial members. Since this journal aims to serve EST workers, we have an open-access policy. Our international, high-quality manuscript submission and examination system attaches particular importance to innovation and efficiency. We call widely for high-caliber papers, organize a strict evaluation process, and optimize editing and publishing procedures in order to set up a high-quality platform in the field of engineering. Running an EST journal is hard work; this is a brand-new journey for us in which we are charged with heavy responsibilities, and which contains both opportunities and challenges. We sincerely feel that it is important to enhance the characteristics of this journal by strengthening both its international scope and its engineering background. We hope to encourage both readers and authors to try their best in more innovative ways, to pursue quality, and to improve in efficiency; and we hope to show the same characteristics of innovation, quality, and efficiency in our journal. We look forward to all papers and articles from EST experts and scholars, and all comments from readers; these valued contributions will ensure that Engineering becomes better and better.

data.desc: Frontiers of Engineering Management（FEM）创刊于2014年，是由中国工程院主管，华中科技大学和清华大学联合承办，由高教社出版的全英文学术期刊。FEM为季刊，开放获取（Open Access）。 《Frontiers of Engineering Management》致力于促进工程管理理论发展、应用实践及人才培养。为工程管理学科科研与教学工作者、一线实践工作者提供高品质国际交流平台，以研究论文、案例研究、综述论文、特别报告等多种形式发布与共享工程管理新知。
data.name: Frontiers of Engineering Management
